scripts.format: prettier --write . && cargo fmt && swiftformat ios/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Note: swiftformat not installed. Install with: brew install swiftformat'
scripts.format:check: prettier --check . && cargo fmt --check && (swiftformat --lint ios/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Note: swiftformat not installed')
scripts.format:swift: swiftformat ios/ || echo 'Note: swiftformat not installed. Install with: brew install swiftformat'
